info.description: Salling Group makes a number of data APIs available for public consumption. Access to these APIs is granted gratis, but requires the acceptance of our terms and conditions and the creation of a user on our developer portal.
info.title: Salling Group Public APIs

tags.name: Food Waste
tags.description: To help with food waste, Salling Group provides food discounts information in all our supermarkets. Each user can send maximum 1,000 requests per day.

tags.name: Holidays
tags.description: Danish national holidays — future, present, and past.

tags.name: Jobs
tags.description: All open job vacancies in Salling Group.

tags.name: Product Suggestions
tags.description: Salling Group has a lot of products. These suggestions help you find relevant ones. Each user can send maximum 10,000 requests per month.

tags.name: Stores
tags.description: Salling Group's physical stores with addresses, opening hours, and more.

get.summary: List all Danish holidays within the given range.
get.description: Note that several holidays can fall on the same date and that both startDate and endDate are included in the range.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Include only holidays that fall after or on this date. Format is (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Include only holidays that fall before or on this date. Format is (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: translation
parameters.description: Translate the names of all holidays to the given culture. The holidays will match Danish law regardless of translation. For instance, "translation=en-us" will not output American holidays, but rather Danish holidays translated to American English. Format is ISO 639-1 and ISO 3166-1 with a dash between them.

get.summary: Decide whether a given date is a holiday or not.
get.description: Simple check whether a given date is a holiday or not

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to query. Format is (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to current date.

200.description: True if the date is a holiday, false if it is not.

schema.description: Is the given date a holiday?

get.summary: List open job vacancies in Salling Group.
get.description: Each job entity includes a lot of information, so consider using pagination and field parameters to limit the response body size when making broad queries.

get.summary: Fetch a specific open job vacancy in Salling Group.
get.description: The id to put in the path is the same as those in the id field of the body.
Returns a list of product suggestions for the given query. Ordered by descending relevance.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The term you want to find product suggestions for.

get.summary: List relevants products given a query string.

get.description: Helpful for finding products that are similar to or could be used as an alternative for a given Bilka ToGo product. Ordered by descending relevance.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: A Bilka ToGo product ID.

200.description: An array of suggested similar products

get.summary: List products that are similar to a given Bilka ToGo product ID.

get.description: Get product suggestions for products that are most frequently bought together with the supplied Bilka ToGo product ID. Ordered by descending relevance.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: A Bilka ToGo product ID

200.description: An array of suggested similar products

get.summary: List products that are frequently bought together with a given Bilka ToGo product ID.
List Salling Group Stores. Use fields parameter to get just the information needed.
get.description: Includes information about department opening hours for garden centers and bakeries, as well as including all fields by default.

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `babyChanging` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.
parameters.name: babyChanging

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `bakery` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `nonFood` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `open247` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `parking` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `petFood` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.

parameters.description: Only return stores where the `pharmacy` attribute is defined and has the given value. Will return stores regardless of this attribute's value if omitted. If the store doesn't have this attribute, it will be omitted if you specify this parameter.

get.summary: Fetch a single store with the v2 format including opening hours for departments.

get.description: Get the schedules for opening hours and any upcoming deviations.

200.description: A list of valid schedules for the store

get.summary: Get the schedules for opening hours and any upcoming deviations.

get.description: Get nearby stores along with their current clearance sales. At most 20 stores are returned by per request. You must supply either `zip` or `geo`.
get.summary: Get nearby stores along with their current clearance sales.

200.description: Gives you a list of stores and their current sales on food. If a product is uncategorized, clearances[*].product.categories is omitted from the response.

400.description: Bad request. We could not make sense of your query. See the developerMessage in the body for details.

example.developerMessage: There are no qualified Foetex, Netto or Bilka stores.

401.description: Unauthorized. We did not recognize the request's credentials and don't know who you are.

get.description: Get a single store along with its current clearance sales. You can find our stores' ids through our '/v2/stores/' API.
get.summary: Get a single store along with its current clearance sales.

200.description: Gives you a store along with its current clearance sales. If a product is uncategorized, clearances[*].product.categories is omitted from the response.

400.description: Bad request. The queried store is not one of Foetex, Netto or Bilka in Denmark or no id is provided.

example.developerMessage: Only Foetex, Netto or Bilka has food waste.

401.description: Unauthorized. We did not recognize the request's credentials and don't know who you are.

404.description: The requested store ID does not exist.

base-brands.description: Only return entities from the given brand. Will return entities of any brand if omitted or empty. Brand is case insensitive.
base-brands.name: brand

categories.description: Only return entities with one of the categories supplied in a comma separated list.
categories.name: categories

city.description: Only return entities located in this city. Will return entities in any city if omitted or empty. City must be an exact (but case-insensitive) match: requesting e.g. city=københavn will not match any entity, but city=københavn nv will.
city.name: city

country.description: Only return entities located in this country. The country code should be using the [ISO-3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.
country.name: country

employmentType.description: Specify this to return either only full time positions or part time positions. If unspecified, jobs are returned irrespective of whether they are full time or part time.
employmentType.name: employmentType

fields.description: A comma separated list of fields to return in the response. This will return **only** those fields for each entities, and no others.
fields.name: fields

geo.description: Only return entities near the given geocode. Will return entities with any geocode if omitted or empty. Takes a comma-separated string of latitude comma longitude, e.g. geo=55.10,10.1. Combine with the radius filter to control how close entities must be to the geocode to be included. Note: this field is truncated to 4 digits of precision after the decimal point.
geo.name: geo

hourType.description:
Only return opening hours of this specific type. Will not filter which stores are being returned, but will act as a filter on the hours collection of each store. This is intended for if you need for example only opening hours for the bakery or the gardencenter, instead of the actual stores. 

 __Explanation of non-English types__

* `pakketarn` Package pickup tower.
* `vareudlevering` Pickup location.
hourType.name: hourType

id.description: The id of the entity you want to get
id.name: id

jobLevel.description: What kind of position is this? Management, apprenticeship, under 18, etc.
jobLevel.name: jobLevel

page.description: The page number to get, as described by our [common pagination implementation](https://developer.sallinggroup.com/api-reference#topics-pagination)
page.name: page

per_page.description: The number of items to receive in the response, as described by our [common pagination implementation](https://developer.sallinggroup.com/api-reference#topics-pagination)
per_page.name: per_page

radius.description: Filter out entities that are outside of a given distance from the specified geo location. Specified in kilometres. Default is 5 and takes up to 2 decimals. Has no effect if geo is undefined.
radius.name: radius

region.description: Only return entities located in the given region.
region.name: region

zip.description: Only return entities located in the given postal code. Local postal code format.
zip.name: zip

400.description: Bad Request. We could not make sense of the query parameters we were given.

401.description: Unauthorized. We did not recognize the request's credentials and don't know who you are.

403.description: Forbidden. The request's credentials were recognized, but do not have access to the resource.

404.description: Not Found. The URL with the given input parameters returned no result.

429.description: Too Many Requests. We've received too many requests with your credentials or from your IP lately.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Most likely returned by the upstream server. The schema is controlled by the upstream server.

504.description: Gateway Timeout. We did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.

babyChanging.description: Does the store have baby changing facilities?

bakery.description: Does the store have a bakery?

carlsJunior.description: Does the store have a Carls' Jr. restaurant?

enablingFacilities.description: Does the store have enabling facilities?

flowers.description: Does the store have a flower section?

garden.description: Does the store have a garden section?

holidayOpen.description: Is the store open during holidays?

open247.description: Is the store open 24/7 (all hours of the day, all days of the week)?

parking.description: Does the store have a parking lot for customers?

parkingRestrictions.description: Does the store's parking lot have parking restrictions?

petFood.description: Does the store have a pet food section?

smileyscheme.description: ID of the Smiley Scheme for the store.

spotFood.description: Does the store have Spot Food?

spotNonfood.description: Does the store have Spot Nonfood?

starbucks.description: Does the store have a Starbucks?

swipBox.description: Does the store have a SwipBox?

wc.description: Does the store have toilets for customers?

wifi.description: Does the store have open WiFi for customers?

closeTime.description: The time when the store closes on the days this deviation is valid for.

name.description: The name of this deviation. Usually the holiday causing this deviation in opening hours.

opentime.description: The time when the store opens on the days this deviation is valid for.

validFrom.description: Date from which this deviation is in effect. (inclusive)

validTo.description: Date on which this deviation ceases to be in effect. (inclusive)

developerMessage.description: A human-readable error message intended for developer consumption (as opposed to programmatic consumption).

FoodWaste.description: Provide all up-to-date food discounts in a store.

clearances.description: The list of available food clearances.

coordinates.description: The coordinates in GeoJSON format, an array with 2 elements, longitude and latitude in that order.

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific store

date.description: The date of the holiday in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name.description: The name of the holiday in the language specified by the translation parameter.

nationalHoliday.description: Whether or not the holiday is a national holiday, warranting a day off.

close.description: The time the store closes on the day specified in date

closed.description: Whether the store is closed on this entire day or not

date.description: The date when the hours are valid

open.description: The time the store opens on the day specified in date

type.description: The type of area that is affected by these opening hours

customerFlow.description: The prediction of customer flows of a shop in a day. Each number represents the predicted customer flow per hour in the range of [0, 1]. The higher the number, the busier the shop. The prediction time series starts at midnight. It only appears when the type is 'store' or 'bilkatogo'.

title.description: Job listing title in local language.

description.example:
Førsteassistent i Netto


Sådan er vi

Vi savner en god kollega, der kan spille sammen med os og vores kunder. Vi har et uformelt miljø, hvor tæt samspil, høj energi, humor og gejst er væsentlige ting i dagligdagen. Det stiller naturligvis særlige krav til os som team.

Sådan er dine opgaver, og sådan er du

Du er med overalt i butikken, men har særligt ansvar for dine egne områder i butikken. Nogle gange om ugen har du ledelsesansvaret i et kortere tidsrum, når du åbner eller lukker butikken.

Du sætter en ære i at gøre butikken pæn og præsentabel.

Naturligvis er det en fordel, at du er uddannet i butik og har haft et vist ledelsesansvar, men vi sørger for en grundig oplæring.

Personalegoder

Som ansat i Netto har du mulighed for at benytte en lang række personalegoder.

  • Personalerabat i Bilka, føtex og Netto
  • Leje af sommerhuse til favorable priser
  • Frisk frugt og grønt på arbejdspladsen hver dag
  • ....i alt omkring 100 - interne og eksterne - rabatordninger

Sådan

Har du lyst til at blive Netto's friske ansigt udadtil, så send en ansøgning. Ansøgninger behandles løbende. Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig.
description.description: Longer job listing description in local language. Includes HTML tags.

start.description: The time and date that employment starts.

hours.description: Either a number of hours (like "37") or a textual description (like "deltid")

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific job

currency.description: The currency all prices are presented in.

discount.description: The amount of money this offer discounts the product by.

ean.description: The EAN code for this specific offer.

endTime.description: The end of the validity period of this offer in ISO 8601 format.

lastUpdate.description: The last time this offer was updated in ISO 8601 format.

newPrice.description: The amount of money to pay for this offer.

originalPrice.description: The price of the product without a discount.

percentDiscount.description: The percentage difference between original price and the new price.

startTime.description: The beginning of the validity period of this offer in ISO 8601 format.

stock.description: The amount of this product that is discounted in the store.

stockUnit.description: The unit that stock is represented in.

Product.description: Illustrate product via categories (optional), description, image and ean.

categories.description: The customer facing hierachy representing category levels.

en.example: Dairy And Cold Storage>Lunch Meats>Meat>Sliced Lunch Meats

description.description: The text shown on the price badge in the stores.

ean.description: The EAN code for the product.

image.description: A link to an image of the product.

validFrom.description: Date from which this schedule is in effect. (inclusive)

validTo.description: Date on which this schedule ceases to be in effect. (inclusive)

closeTime.description: The time when the store closes on this day.

opentime.description: The time when the store opens on this day.

coordinates.description: The coordinates in GeoJSON format, an array with 2 elements, longitude and latitude in that order.

created.description: A timestamp of when the API definition of this store was created in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date-time format

distance_km.description: Distance from store to the geolocation used in request. Distance is only calculated in response to requests with geolocation

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific store

modified.description: A timestamp of when the API definition of this store was last updated in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date-time format

phoneNumber.description: The phone number for reaching the store

sapSiteId.description: The stores corresponding SAP site ID

vikingStoreId.description: The stores corresponding Viking Store Number

id.description: The suggested product's Salling Group product id

prod_id.description: The suggested product's Bilkatogo product id

description.description: The description of the suggested product

img.description: The primary image of the suggested product

Bearer.description: Used in **untrusted environments** like Single Page Applications that can not keep a secret, this type of authentication lets you pass a token issued on [our Developer Portal](https://developer.sallinggroup.com). Not all API endpoints are available with Bearer authentication. [Read more about our authentication.](https://developer.sallinggroup.com/api-reference#topics-authentication)

JWT.description: Used in **trusted environments** like secured backends that can keep a secret, this type of authentication requires that you describe the request you're about to make in a payload, sign this payload with your secret, and use the resulting JWT as a token. All API endpoints are available with JWT authentication. [Read more about our authentication.](https://developer.sallinggroup.com/api-reference#topics-authentication)
